source.query:
SELECT    {[Measures].[3UCCYRTVUJ3021VGIRIMPN4ZU],        [Measures].[3UCCYS1KDHOPKOEWOLKYZP3PM]    }ON 0,    NON EMPTY CROSSJOIN(        CROSSJOIN(            CROSSJOIN(                CROSSJOIN(                    CROSSJOIN(                        CROSSJOIN(                            CROSSJOIN(                                CROSSJOIN(                                    CROSSJOIN(                                        CROSSJOIN(                                            CROSSJOIN(                                                CROSSJOIN(                                                    CROSSJOIN(                                                        CROSSJOIN(                                                            CROSSJOIN(                                                                DISTINCT(                                                                    [ZAFUNDID].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                                                                ),                                                                DISTINCT(                                                                    [ZALLOCID].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                                                                )                                                            ),                                                            DISTINCT(                                                                [0CUSTOMER].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                                                            )                                                        ),                                                        DISTINCT(                                                            [0CUSTOMER__0CUST_GROUP].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                                                        )                                                    ),                                                    DISTINCT(                                                        [ZFPAYMENT__ZCUSTPAYE].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                                                    )                                                ),                                                DISTINCT(                                                    [0DIVISION].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                                                )                                            ),                                            DISTINCT(                                                [ZNFUNDID].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                                            )                                        ),                                        DISTINCT(                                            [ZFEFFYR].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                                        )                                    ),                                    DISTINCT(                                        [ZFPAYMENT].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                                    )                                ),                                DISTINCT(                                    [ZAFUNDID__ZFUNDTYPE].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                                )                            ),                            DISTINCT(                                [ZFPAYMENT__ZPAYDATE].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                            )                        ),                        DISTINCT(                            [ZFPAYMENT__ZPAYTYPE].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                        )                    ),                    DISTINCT(                        [ZAPROMOID].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                    )                ),                DISTINCT(                    [ZAPROMOID__ZPRENDDT].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS                )            ),            DISTINCT(                [ZAPROMOID__ZPRSTRTDT].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS            )        ),        DISTINCT(            [0CUSTOMER__0CUST_GRP5].[LEVEL01].ALLMEMBERS        )    )    
PROPERTIES MEMBER_CAPTION, MEMBER_UNIQUE_NAME ON 1 FROM [ZCPM_M64/ZCPM_M64_Q040] 
CELL PROPERTIES VALUE SAP VARIABLES [ZI_FUNPE] INCLUDING [ZFEFFYR].[2019] : [ZFEFFYR].[2019] [Z_CUSTR] 
INCLUDING [0CUSTOMER].[0001910803] [ZM_CUSTG] INCLUDING [0CUSTOMER__0CUST_GROUP].[01] [0DIVISIO] INCLUDING [0DIVISION].[13]
